text: konege, avaru tam'ma kararannu muridudarinda navu avarannu sapisidevu mattu avara manas'sugalannu kathoragolisidevu. Avariga matannu adara hinneleyinda sarisi tiruci biduttiddare mattu avarige nidalagidda bodhanegala dodda bhagavannu avaru maretu bittiddare. Avarallina kelavara horatu ulidavara vancaneya suddigalu nimage sada taluputtale iruttave. Eniddaru nivu avarannu ksamisiri mattu (avara tappugalannu) kadeganisiri. Khanditavagiyu allahanu udarigalannu pritisuttane
